rules_text:
Enchant creature
Conceive X–{X}{G}{G} [i]({X}{G}{G}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Create a X/X colorless Elemental creature token, then create a token that's a copy of this card attached to it. Conceive only as a sorcery.)[/i]
Enchanted creature has hexproof as long as it's tapped and can't be blocked by more than one creature.
